item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Gravity pk, post:16, topic:459200”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=562104.msg4099185#msg4099185 date=1347233570]
Stop the fucking spamming.

You aren’t getting errors, you’re getting a warning. This warning, null pointer, its indicating that there is a method that is being grabbed. And that method being grabbed is not performing its correct function. I can tell you where this nullpointer is coming from if you try this yourself. CombatAssistant.java, line 1400. I can bet you anything that the error means that the bold, Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex].gfx0(2264); is trying to grab a GFX, but it doesn’t exist.

Hint: Null means doesn’t exist. So that’s my theory.

In the meantime, I am reporting this thread to clear the spam out of it.
[/quote]

please tell me how im spamming retard? asked a simple question, miserable retards like u should go outside instead of argue with people over nothing over a screen. lookin for help and u want to be a dick, nice, not tell me, where does that get u in life? kthanxbi.[/quote]That wasn’t to you. That was to ranger squad and tyb97. And I helped you. Read what I posted. Try and replaced the GFX id with another one and see if that fixes it.

Read full topic

In the meantime, I am reporting this thread to clear the spam out of it.[/quote]

please tell me how im spamming retard? asked a simple question, miserable retards like u should go outside instead of argue with people over nothing over a screen. lookin for help and u want to be a dick, nice, not tell me, where does that get u in life? kthanxbi.

item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:14, topic:459200”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=562104.msg4099202#msg4099202 date=1347235201]
I’ve told him how to fix it, whereas you have no idea how to. Encapsulate it in a try/catch statement and print the stack trace of the exception. Or, if all you want to do is fix the “spam”, don’t print anything.
[/quote]Or again like I said, trouble shoot and change the GFX Id to see if it is the gfx that is giving the null pointer.[/quote]
Its not the gfx id because the gfx ids arent initialised in the server. If the exception was in the client then yes, it would be the gfx id. Please just stop, youre embarrasing yourself

Read full topic

item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:10, topic:459200”]ex·cep·tion/ikˈsepSHən/
Noun:A person or thing that is excluded from a general statement or does not follow a rule.

An error does not always have to occur at compilation, it is a runtime error.[/quote]catch(NullPointerException e) means to catch and write out the full error to cmd. He could add that case around this method that is giving him the error. Whether its a warning or an error (warning), doesn’t matter. What matters is that he has something that is trying to be found, and can’t. Now stop arguing.

Read full topic
item.source: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd

item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

ex·cep·tion/ikˈsepSHən/
Noun:A person or thing that is excluded from a general statement or does not follow a rule.

An error does not always have to occur at compilation, it is a runtime error.

item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:8, topic:459200”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=562104.msg4099185#msg4099185 date=1347233570]
Stop the fucking spamming.

You aren’t getting errors, you’re getting a warning. This warning, null pointer, its indicating that there is a method that is being grabbed. And that method being grabbed is not performing its correct function. I can tell you where this nullpointer is coming from if you try this yourself. CombatAssistant.java, line 1400. I can bet you anything that the error means that the bold, Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex].gfx0(2264); is trying to grab a GFX, but it doesn’t exist.

Hint: Null means doesn’t exist. So that’s my theory.

In the meantime, I am reporting this thread to clear the spam out of it.
[/quote]
No, its most definitely an error Mr Backseat Moderator.

catch(NullPointerException e)[/quote]
No it is not an error. Its a warning. If it was an error, it wouldn’t be able to compile as he isn’t giving us compiler errors. He is still able to run it fine until these graphics are trying to grabbed. Nullpointer means it can’t be found.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Nasty Spam in Run cmd
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

so i always got this nasty shit in my cmd for my server, can any1 help me diagnose this? it happens when people pk i belive. ill post the errors with their lines.

http://prntscr.com/fa1w0 thats my cmd errors

This is my combatassistant.java’s like 1400 to the end

(starts at 1400) Server.playerHandler.players[c.oldPlayerIndex].gfx0(2264); // 1738
c.SSPLIT = false;
b.stop();
}
}, 500);

here is my eventcontainer.java

public void execute() {
	this.lastRun = System.currentTimeMillis();
	this.event.execute(this);                          (this is line 57)
}

heres my event manage

	for (EventContainer container : events) {
			if (container.isRunning()) {
				if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - container.getLastRun()) >= container
						.getTick()) {
					try {
						container.execute();             (line 101)
					} catch (Exception e){e.printStackTrace();}	
				}
				if (container.getTick() < waitFor || waitFor == -1) {
					waitFor = container.getTick();
				}
			} else {
				// add to remove list
				remove.add(container);
			}
		}

I believe thats everything, tried to make it simple to understand, please let me know if u can figure it out

Read full topic
